Definition.WordDefinition: Pierre, SD (city, FIPS 49600) Location: 44.37298 N, 100.32248 W Population (1990): 12906 (5390 housing units) Area: 33.7 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 57501
Pierre n : capital of the state of South Dakota; located in central South Dakota on the Missouri river [syn: {capital of South Dakota}]
